post.body: my motivation has gone to the beach...
that's great! I will have to see what to plant for the late summer/ autumn season. Gonna start small :)
hey that's fab! I hope to blog about a gardening project soon. I'm gonna use my bro's place as the testing ground. lucky him!
goodness knows why! I've been blabbing on about chocs & cashews mainly ;)
- got a Chow voucher in the mail from you. Thanks!! :) yum yum
we had one, sold it b4 Xmas. It was fun, I liked the 'tip the board to sink d balls' & snowboard. Hulahoop always funi 2 watch!
so you not so busy eh?
I'd hide them in a really big chicken & cashew dish!
yeah, 50km/hr. Such a bugger.
yeah, that could've been a nice dinner out. Oh well, that'll teach me! Hope you're enjoying your new home theatre system!!
only $80. How can I possibly be speeding in my granny car?? ;)
Had a great day with whanau, eating good food, enjoyin sun, playin games & catchin up w family & cuz who grow up so fast
Finally a pet that pulls its weight around d house/office! RT @guykawasaki: Hamster powers environ-friendly paper shredder http://ow.ly/1MV
Interesting post & comments about yr Twitter pic. Do u think yr pic (if of yr face), shld look like u? I say "of course!" http://is.gd/dSMC
Good morning to all my new followers! Wow, there's a lot of you today. I hope all of Twitterverse has a safe and fun New Year's eve!
Feeling the effects of all the Christmas chocs. Off to the gym I go!!
Autoresponders on twitter are a big no-no (http://is.gd/dW0X frm @chrisbrogan, RT by @segdeha) We want to tweet w real ppl, not machines!
Nice mashup of music & vid @joegreenz Haunting, dreamy. I think how insignifcant we really r, but so impt 2our own worlds http://is.gd/dViF
Taking a little squiz around iTunes' radio stations. Which are your favs?
It wasn't me, although I am jealous ;) http://www.stuff.co.nz/4805343a4560.html
